name: Bazen
description:
Bazen is a 2D co-op puzzle game based on the loneliness in everyday life. Both players use the keyboard for the controller and they need to cooperate in order to control the character.

The game is inspired from my parents complaints about how my games are hard to play and control. I divided the four way controller into two and make the game playable with two players and design the levels with easy to medium difficulty.

Programming - Design - Graphics - Music - Sfx by Efe Alaçamlı

Soundtrack is available on Bandcamp.
